00045 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00046 {
00047     if(argc < 3)
00048     {
00049         printUsage();
00050         exit(1);
00051     }
00052 
00053     // check command option
00054     if(strcmp(argv[1], "--encode") != 0)
00055     {
00056         cerr << "unknown command option " << argv[1] << endl;
00057         printUsage();
00058         exit(1);
00059     }
00060 
00061     Knowledge::EncodeType encode = Knowledge::decodeEncodeType(argv[2]);
00062     if(encode == Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_NUM)
00063     {
00064         cerr << "unknown encode type " << argv[2] << endl;
00065         printUsage();
00066         exit(1);
00067     }
00068 
00069     // create factory
00070     JMA_Factory* factory = JMA_Factory::instance();
00071 
00072     // create analyzer and knowledge
00073     Analyzer* analyzer = factory->createAnalyzer();
00074     Knowledge* knowledge = factory->createKnowledge();
00075 
00076     // set encoding
00077     knowledge->setEncodeType(encode);
00078 
00079     // set dictionary files
00080     string sysdict = TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_SYSTEM_DICT;
00081     string userdict = TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_USER_DICT_CSV;
00082     if(encode == Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_EUCJP)
00083     {
00084         sysdict += "/../bin_eucjp";
00085     }
00086     else if(encode == Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_SJIS)
00087     {
00088         sysdict += "/../bin_sjis";
00089     }
00090     else if(encode == Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_UTF8)
00091     {
00092         sysdict += "/../bin_utf8";
00093     }
00094 
00095     // load dictioanry files
00096     cout << "system dictionary: " << sysdict << endl;
00097     cout << "user dictionary: " << userdict << endl;
00098     knowledge->setSystemDict(sysdict.c_str());
00099     knowledge->addUserDict(userdict.c_str());
00100     int result = knowledge->loadDict();
00101     if(result == 0)
00102     {
00103         cerr << "fail to load dictionary files" << endl;
00104         exit(1);
00105     }
00106 
00107     // set knowledge
00108     analyzer->setKnowledge(knowledge);
00109 
00110     // analyze string
00111     const char* str = "abc";
00112     cout << "input: " << str << endl;
00113     cout << "output: " << analyzer->runWithString(str) << endl;
00114 
00115     delete knowledge;
00116     delete analyzer;
00117 
00118     return 0;
00119 }
